title: UnicornPass
name: unicornpass
description: Colorful password fields using SHA1 hash of your password. You will know if you typed the correct password before submitting. https://github.com/carmebar/unicornpass
author: Carlos Melero

preferences.name: salt
preferences.title: Salt
preferences.description: The salt prevents the same password to give the same colors on different computers. Salt is unique by default. Do NOT edit unless you know what you're doing.
